comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of milk chocolate bars
- y: number of dark chocolate bars

Definitions:
- x: number of milk chocolate bars to be produced
- y: number of dark chocolate bars to be produced

Extracted Constraints:
- Cocoa: 4x + 6y \leq 2000
- Milk: 7x + 3y \leq 1750
- Milk Chocolate Ratio: x \geq 2y

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize 15x + 12y

Definitions:
- Cocoa: total units of cocoa used in production of chocolate bars
- Milk: total units of milk used in production of chocolate bars
- Milk Chocolate Ratio: at least 2 times as many milk chocolate bars need to be made as dark chocolate bars
- Minimize 15x + 12y: minimize the total production time for making milk and dark chocolate bars
